channel.title: 508 help. Trade,Follow,Getting friends to show if they are online
channel.description:
As you read I have been searching and such and have came up with no answers :(. On my server when I click trade on another player, nothing happens at all. Nothing pops up to the other player. And nothing gets done. I am getting unhandled button errors, but I am new with this and would like some help as to fixing it. Same thing happens with follow, unhandled button and nothing happens. As for the friends list issue, everytime I log out and in the friends list is wiped and when I add someone that is on nothing happens.
Any help is GREATLY appreciated. Please & Thanks,
OMG its Nick

item.title: 508 help. Trade,Follow,Getting friends to show if they are online
item.dc:creator: @candy candy
item.description:
@candy wrote:

umm hi there, I cant get my 508 server to work AT ALL, i got a 525 server working but when i run it in HD my character just keeps walking and doesnt stop at all, please tell me if you are running it on hd, if so then how?

Read full topic
item.source: 508 help. Trade,Follow,Getting friends to show if they are online
